string.value: You want to restore the #t4220151# that the Black Wings gave to #p2090004#. The one person in #b#m250000000##k who is capable of doing the restoration is #b#p2091008# the painter#k.

#p2091008# states that to restore the #t4220151#, one must make a #b#t4032342##k and pour it all over the scroll. He then asks you to bring the materials necessary to make the ink, so he can make some for you. 

#i4000286# #t4000286# #b#c4000286# / 50#k
#i4000287# #t4000287# #b#c4000287# / 50#k
#i4000291# #t4000291# #b#c4000291# / 100#k
You handed #p2091008# the materials and received #t4032342# in return. You should now open the #t4220151# and pour the #t4032342# over it.

How can I help you? What? Are you asking me whether this #t4220151# can be restored? Let's see…How in the world did this #t4220151# get soaked and steamed in boiling water? Only a dummy like #p2090004# would do such a thing. Good thing the paper is so strong. It should be fine.

Well, restoring the #t4220151# is not impossible. As long as I have some special ink, I'll be able to restore it. I can make the #t4032342# myself, so all you'll need to do is get me the materials needed for me to make one. I also charge a small fee, of course.

These are the items I need for the special ink: #b50 #t4000286#s#k, #b50 #t4000287#s#k, and #b100 #t4000291#s#k along with a service fee of #b500,000 Mesos#k. That should be enough to make the #b8 batches of #t4032342##k required to restore the #t4220151#.
Hmmm… So you can't pay for the fee? In that case, I better get back to work. I'm a busy man, you know.
Wow, you brought all the materials I've asked you for. Now please hand me the items along with the required fee.

Okay, here are 8 batches of #t4032342#. Now open up the #t4220151# and spray #t4032342# all over the scroll to restore the content. If you happen to lose the #t4032342#, then I'll make you more, so just let me know.

I don't think you have gotten all the materials for #t4032342# yet. I'll tell you what I need one more time: #b50 #t4000286#s#k, #b50 #t4000287#s#k, and #b100 #t4000291#s#k along with a service fee of #b500,000 Mesos#k.
